name: More Contrast Fix for Mastodon
description:
Improves the contrast on the most hard-to-read, lowest contrast text in Mastodon.

Also slightly darkens the grey backgrounds in columns to make all text there easier to read.
additional_info:
Because Stylish themes are bound to domains, you may need to edit the theme after installing and add your instance's domain before you can enable it. I added some popular ones, but there are so many instances out there!

This could mostly all be done by tweaking one color in mastodon, but hosted instances don't have this luxury. So I made this for now, perhaps it helps someone else.
